sentences.en: A general algorithm based on interpolate subdivision surface to simulate stationary flexible cloth is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于插值细分造型的织物模拟算法.

sentences.en: A user - defined pore pressure distribution cannot be used to interpolate pore pressures in other clusters.
sentences.cn: 用户自定义的孔压分布,不能用于其他类组的孔压内插.

sentences.en: And then elicit different interpolate algorithms in the different conditions.
sentences.cn: 并且然后得出不同内插算法在不同的条件.

sentences.en: Do not interpolate between these temperatures. Consult the factory.
sentences.cn: 不能插入这些温度之间. 请咨询工厂.

sentences.en: He started humming a tune, then interpolated the odd word as though having difficulty remembering.
sentences.cn: 他开始哼起一个曲调，尽管记得不太清楚，他又插入了几个词。

sentences.en: The analyst is required to interpolate values between standards.
sentences.cn: 分析人员需要在这些标准中插入一些值.

sentences.en: Then a high - degree geometric continuity blending surface is obtained with transfinite interpolate method.
sentences.cn: 将其充分性与超限插值方法相结合,成功地构造出两个参数曲面间的高 阶 几何连续过渡曲面.

words.tran_cn: 提出（异议等）；使插入；使干涉

trans.tran_en: to interrupt someone by saying something
